sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1985, ch. 168, § 22 repealed 22-6-2 NMSA 1978, relating to regular and special school district elections, precincts and polling places, effective June 14, 1985. For present comparable provisions,see1-22-3 to 1-22-6 NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1993, ch. 226, § 54 repealed 22-6-5 NMSA 1978, relating to qualifications for a candidate for membership on a local school board, effective July 1, 1993. For provisions of former section,seethe 1992 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
